item.title: Conforming Loan DTI Requirements: Understanding Debt-to-Income Ratios for 2025 Approval
item.description:
Your debt-to-income ratio (DTI) is one of the most critical factors in conforming loan approvalâ€”yet it’s also one of the most misunderstood. Many borrowers think they need perfect credit and massive income to qualify, when in reality, Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac accept DTI ratios up to 50% with compensating factors.

Let me break down exactly how DTI works, what ratios you need for approval, and proven strategies to optimize your debt picture before applying.
